Title: Modulation Strategies for Robust Optical Wireless Communications and Sensing in 6G
Key_Contribution: CE-OFDM emerges as a compelling waveform for VLC systems in 6G, offering advantages in both communication robustness and potential for localization.
Gap_Addressed: The paper addresses the need for a waveform that can efficiently support both communication and sensing in 6G optical wireless networks.

Title: Photonic Terahertz Integrated Sensing and Communication (ISAC) Systems
Key_Contribution: This paper explores the role of photonic terahertz technologies in integrated sensing and communication systems.
Gap_Addressed: The paper addresses the need for reliable connectivity in wireless networks and the integration of sensing and communication systems.

Title: Analysis of Visible Light-Based ISAC Channel Characteristics in a V2V Scenario
Venue: 2025 IEEE Wireless Communications and Networking Conference (WCNC)
Key_Contribution: This paper investigates the visible light-based integrated sensing and communication channel characteristics in a vehicle-to-vehicle scenario.
Gap_Addressed: The research on sensing channel is relatively limited, especially the different sensing modes with different positions of transmitter and sensing receiver.
